game.name: Cute Dogs
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 돈으로 행복을 살 수 없다고 생각하십니까? 개를 사세요! 얼마나 귀여운지 보세요! 네발 달린 친구들과 함께 플레이하며 차이점을 찾아보세요. 이 귀여운 생명체들과 함께라면 고민을 잊고 긴장을 풀 수 있을 거예요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is it possible to buy some happiness with money? Who knows, but you can buy yourself a dog! Look, how cute they are! Play with our fluffy little fellas, a «find-differences» game. These cute little puppies can help you relax and find some peace of mind.

reviewHighlights.text: This game is amazing. From the gameplay to the lore, this game is for casual and hardcore gamers alike. The lore is extremely rich and deep and it wil...
